verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> unto a man <S%G444><s%> that was a householder <S%G3617><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> went out <S%G1831><s%> early <S%G260><s%> in the morning <S%G4404><s%> to hire <S%G3409><s%> laborers <S%G2040><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> vineyard <S%G290><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when he had agreed <S%G4856><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the laborers <S%G2040><s%> for <S%G1537><s%> a shilling <S%G1220><s%> a day <S%G2250><s%>, he sent <S%G649><s%> them <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> vineyard <S%G290><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he went out <S%G1831><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G5610><s%> third <S%G5154><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%>, and saw <S%G1492><s%> others <S%G243><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the marketplace <S%G58><s%> idle <S%G692><s%>;

and <S%G2548><s%> to them <S%G2036><s%> he said <S%G5217><s%>, Go ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the vineyard <S%G290><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G5600><s%> right <S%G1342><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> they went their way <S%G565><s%>.

Again <S%G3825><s%> he went out <S%G1831><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G5610><s%> sixth <S%G1623><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the ninth <S%G1766><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%>, and did <S%G4160><s%> likewise <S%G5615><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G5610><s%> eleventh <S%G1734><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> he went out <S%G1831><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> others <S%G243><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> stand ye <S%G2476><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> idle <S%G692><s%>?

They say <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Because <S%G3754><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> hath hired <S%G3409><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>. He saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Go <S%G5217><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the vineyard <S%G290><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G1096><s%> even <S%G3798><s%> was come <S%G1096><s%>, the lord <S%G2962><s%> of the vineyard <S%G290><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto <S%G2012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> steward <S%G2012><s%>, Call <S%G2564><s%> the laborers <S%G2040><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> pay <S%G591><s%> them <S%G846><s%> their hire <S%G3408><s%>, beginning <S%G756><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when they came <S%G2064><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> were hired about <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G5610><s%> eleventh <S%G1734><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%>, they received <S%G2983><s%> every man <S%G303><s%> a shilling <S%G1220><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G2064><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> came <S%G2064><s%>, they supposed <S%G3543><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they would receive <S%G2983><s%> more <S%G4119><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> likewise <S%G2532><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> every man <S%G303><s%> a shilling <S%G1220><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> when they received <S%G2983><s%> it <S%G1111><s%>, they murmured against <S%G2596><s%> the householder <S%G3617><s%>,

saying <S%G3754><s%>, These <S%G3778><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> have spent <S%G4160><s%> but one <S%G1520><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thou hast made <S%G4160><s%> them <S%G846><s%> equal <S%G2470><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%>, who have borne <S%G941><s%> the burden <S%G922><s%> of the day <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the scorching heat <S%G2742><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to one <S%G1520><s%> of them <S%G846><s%>, Friend <S%G2083><s%>, I do <S%G91><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> wrong <S%G91><s%>: didst <S%G4856><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> thou agree <S%G4856><s%> with me <S%G3427><s%> for a shilling <S%G1220><s%>?

Take <S%G142><s%> up that which is thine <S%G4674><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> go thy way <S%G5217><s%>; it is my will <S%G2309><s%> to <S%G1161><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> unto <S%G2078><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> last <S%G2078><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>.

Is it <S%G1832><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lawful <S%G1832><s%> for me <S%G3427><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I will <S%G2309><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> mine own <S%G1487><s%>? or is <S%G2076><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> good <S%G18><s%>?
So <S%G3779><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> first <S%G4413><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> last <S%G2078><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> as Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was going up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>, he took <S%G3880><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> apart <S%G2398><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> on the way <S%G3598><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>,

Behold <S%G2400><s%>, we go up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> shall be delivered <S%G3860><s%> unto the chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they shall condemn <S%G2632><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to death <S%G2288><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> shall deliver <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%> unto the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> mock <S%G1702><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to scourge <S%G3146><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to crucify <S%G4717><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G2250><s%> third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> he shall be raised up <S%G450><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> the mother <S%G3384><s%> of <S%G5207><s%> the sons <S%G5207><s%> of Zebedee <S%G2199><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> her <S%G846><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%>, worshipping <S%G4352><s%> him <S%G2532><s%>, and asking <S%G154><s%> a certain thing <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto her <S%G846><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> wouldest thou <S%G2309><s%>? She saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Command <S%G2036><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> may sit <S%G2523><s%>, one <S%G1520><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> right hand <S%G1188><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> thy left <S%G2176><s%> hand <S%G1722><s%>, in thy <S%G4675><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%>, Ye know <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> ye ask <S%G154><s%>. Are ye able <S%G1410><s%> to drink <S%G4095><s%> the cup <S%G4221><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G3195><s%> about to drink <S%G4095><s%>? They say <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, We are able <S%G1410><s%>.

He <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, My <S%G3450><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> ye shall drink <S%G4095><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> to sit <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> right hand <S%G1188><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> left <S%G2176><s%> hand <S%G1473><s%>, is not <S%G3756><s%> mine <S%G3450><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> for them for whom <S%G3739><s%> it hath been prepared <S%G2090><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G191><s%> the ten <S%G1176><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it <S%G23><s%>, they were moved with indignation concerning <S%G4012><s%> the two <S%G1417><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> them <S%G846><s%> unto him <S%G2036><s%>, and said, Ye know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the rulers <S%G758><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> lord it over <S%G2634><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> their great <S%G3173><s%> ones exercise authority over <S%G2715><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

Not <S%G3756><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> shall <S%G2071><s%> it be <S%G2071><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> whosoever <S%G3739><s%> would become <S%G2309><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> shall be <S%G2309><s%> your <S%G5213><s%> minister <S%G1249><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> whosoever <S%G3739><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> be <S%G1511><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> shall be <S%G1511><s%> your <S%G5213><s%> servant <S%G1401><s%>:

even as <S%G5618><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to be ministered unto <S%G1247><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> to minister <S%G1247><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> his <S%G846><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> a ransom <S%G3083><s%> for <S%G473><s%> many <S%G4183><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G1607><s%> they <S%G846><s%> went <S%G1607><s%> out <S%G575><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Jericho <S%G2410><s%>, a <S%G3793><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, two <S%G1417><s%> blind men <S%G5185><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the way side <S%G3598><s%>, when they heard <S%G191><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was passing by <S%G3855><s%>, cried out <S%G2896><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, have mercy on <S%G1653><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>, thou son <S%G5207><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they should hold their peace <S%G4623><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> they cried <S%G2896><s%> out the more <S%G3185><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, have mercy on <S%G1653><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>, thou son <S%G5207><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stood still <S%G2476><s%>, and called <S%G5455><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> will ye <S%G2309><s%> that I should do <S%G4160><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>?
They say <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> may be opened <S%G455><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, being moved with compassion <S%G4697><s%>, touched <S%G680><s%> their <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> they received their <S%G846><s%> sight <S%G308><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.
